queries.sql: SELECT * FROM menu LEFT JOIN menu_role USING (menu_id) LEFT JOIN module USING (module_id) LEFT JOIN menu_kategori USING(menu_kategori_id) WHERE menu_kategori.is_active = "1" AND role_id IN ( 1) ORDER BY menu_kategori.urutan, menu.urutan

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM menu LEFT JOIN module USING (module_id) WHERE 1=1 AND is_active = 1 AND type = "Frontend" ORDER BY menu.urutan
